question: 尻尾
sourceMnemonic: Your <kanji>butt</kanji> <kanji>tail</kanji> is just your <vocabulary>tail</vocabulary>, though I wonder why they had to specify that it was your butt tail. Where else do you have a tail, I wonder?
sourceReadingMnemonic:
The reading for this word is a bit of an exception. You kind of already know the reading for <ja>尻</ja> from the kun'yomi <ja>しり</ja> you learned already. Here it gets shortened to <ja>しっ</ja>. The reading for <ja>尾</ja> is totally different from what you learned, so here's a mnemonic to help you:

The animal with the best <vocabulary>tail</vocabulary> in the world is the <reading>po</reading>lar (<ja>ぽ</ja>) bear. They're stubby and white and cute. Only polar bears have tails like that!
